known_issues: Frontend throwing 'Actor missing' error due to outdated Candid declarations after adding clearBoardroom to main.mo

new_feature_requests.summary: Regenerate the backend Candid interface declarations (.did file) to include the clearBoardroom method that was added to backend/main.mo
Synchronize the frontend Candid declarations (.did.js and .did.d.ts files) so that the React app can recognize and call the clearBoardroom method without 'Actor missing' errors

projectName: Regenerate Candid declarations for clearBoardroom method
